channel.title: guide on Gianluca Fiore
channel.description: Recent content in guide on Gianluca Fiore

item.title: How To Travel Solo
item.description: After the first book, of which I was no more than a contributor, Your First Year In Code, I decided that was fine and actually great fun to write and publish books so I wrote another one :) This one much more personal, about my passion for traveling and in particular to travel alone, something that I have been doing for more than 20 years, nearly each year: How To Travel Solo.

item.title: A Brief Guide To DuckDuckGo
item.description: Or why you should be using it even if you don’t care about privacy or don’t know what a search engine bubble may be. It’s in no way a comprehensive guide nor “the best of” of what DuckDuckGo offers. Just what I find more useful and have been using so far. Time days between today and 02/28/2013 = 16 days. Unfortunately, this uses the US month/day/year format 18:30 to 19:25 = 55 minutes february calendar = print the calendar for this year’s february calendar next month = print next month’s calendar Travel weather = weather for your current location 80100 = search for the map of your postal code.
